markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Witch's Communion](/Feats.aspx?ID=5011) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 189 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Witch's Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=5003)

</column>

---

You can keep watch over multiple charges. Each day during your preparations, you can designate a number of charges equal to your Intelligence modifier instead of just one.
name: Witch's Communion
